casebody.data:
Thomas ARTHUR, Plaintiff in Error, v. NEW YORK, NEW HAVEN & HARTFORD RAILROAD COMPANY, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 9, 1928. No. 97. Andrew Eckel, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. J. M. Gibbons, of New York City (E. R. Brumley, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
